sections.description: This section calculates and presents key metrics related to chassis utilization for Evergreen PSW LSA/LGB operations, including gate-outs, dwell times, chassis on the street, and required chassis counts under different stress scenarios.
key_components: Chassis on the street in period
sections.notes: Calculations are based on CMS-PC data and Evergreen's statement of 36k gate moves at Seaside per month. OOS (out-of-service) is considered with 85% stress. Dwell time is analyzed from April, May, and June 2015 data.
